about_the_game:
Wouldn't you want to experience the joy of creating a character with a Dungeon to delve into? Introducing Dungeon Deck! Customize your character as you wish and set out to explore dungeons! Develop and modify your deck as you journey, and when you perish, continue your game rather than starting over, growing even stronger! Conquer dungeons with the combination of an immense skill tree and card-battler elements!

Explore the depths of intricate dungeons with your customized character, where every choice shapes your destiny. Unleash powerful abilities from an expansive skill tree, and craft a deck that reflects your playstyle. Death is not the end but a new beginning, as you grow stronger with each encounter. Dive into Dungeon Deck and forge your legend in the darkness!

Extensive Skill Tree

You will explore a versatile skill tree with over 20 options, allowing you to deeply customize your character and strategically plan your progression. Whether you focus on raw strength, cunning agility, or magical prowess, you will craft your abilities to suit your playstyle. With countless ways to enhance your deck-building experience, the skill tree gives you the power to tackle every dungeon with precision and control.

Customize Your Hero, Choose Your Path

In this adventure, you will fully personalize your hero, from their appearance to their abilities. Choose from multiple classes, each with its distinct playstyle. Will you master the ranged precision of the Hunter, the brute strength of the Warrior, or the magical prowess of the Mage? Shape your hero to match your strategy, customize every detail, and embark on a unique journey. You’ll also master the specialized starting decks for each class as you tailor your experience to your play style.

Explore Vast, ARPG-Inspired Areas

Immerse yourself in ARPG-style zones where you will grind, explore, and conquer challenging environments. Venture through beautifully designed areas, each with its unique theme, as you collect rare resources and face epic battles. Test your skills and refine your deck as you journey through diverse landscapes that offer endless opportunities for progression. Prepare to dive deep and unlock the full potential of your hero in this rich, ever-expanding world.

name: Dungeon Deck

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Conquer dungeons with the combination of an immense skill tree and card-battler elements!
